channel.title: 🏢 University College London (UCL) on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University College London (UCL) on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Group Robust Preference Optimization in Reward-free RLHF
item.description: Group Robust Preference Optimization (GRPO) enhances reward-free RLHF by aligning LLMs to diverse group preferences, maximizing worst-case performance, and significantly improving fairness.
